Tablet E-Commerce

We are taking the Content Delivery Network (CDN) concept to the next level. Our “Entertainment Distribution Network” (EDN) will enable you to stream any type of digital media from the “cloud” to any tablet device.

In the $544 billion global eCommerce market there is no eCommerce platform that provides a unified shopping cart for the purchase of digital and physical goods, nor is there an eCommerce platform that allows portability of over 12 million digital titles and licenses across all internet-connected devices.

Tabulous provides the solution, an enterprise-class e-commerce platform for the marketing, selling and distribution of digital content and physical goods on tablet devices. Through a single application, Tabulous tablet owners have access to purchase both digital and physical goods through one, unified shopping cart.
